name: lizardman warrior
description: A tall, powerful, reptilian humanoid with a muscular tail whose skin is covered in dark gray-green scales.  They are coldblooded and primarily live in swamps.  This one is carrying a stone-tipped spear.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s thrusts a spear at your %2$s, piercing it!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s thrusts a spear at <npcname>'s %2$s, piercing it!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s thrusts a spear at your %2$s, but glances off your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s thrusts a spear at <npcname>'s %2$s, but glances off armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s thrusts a spear at you, but you evade!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s thrusts a spear at <npcname>, but they evade!

name: lizardman hunter
description: The hunter is smaller than a warrior, but equally as deadly, with their lithe figures and accurate javelin throws.

special_attacks.description: The lizardman hunter hurls a spear!

name: lizardfolk shaman
description: Living as they do in the wild, good relations with the spirits are very important to the lizardfolk.  Shamans are their intermediaries with the spirit world, performing the appropriate rites and offering the appropriate sacrifices.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s mutters some words and the air is filled with a burst of light!

name: lizardfolk chieftain
description: Among the lizardfolk, ambition is a rare quality.  Chieftains earn their place by exhibiting unusually high levels of ambition, often mistaken by outsiders as excessive, brutal violence.  This chief is the largest and strongest member of its tribe and carries a fierce trident to compliment its teeth and claws.
